concept.title: HBase Properties
concept.shortdesc: You can configure the HBase destination to use HBase properties.

conbody.p:
HBase destinationadditional propertiescustom propertiesHBaseThe HBase destination provides the following options for specifying HBase properties:
Use the hbase-site.xml HBase configuration file You can store the hbase-site.xml configuration file in a directory local to the and specify the path in the destination.
Specify individual properties You can add custom HBase configuration properties to the HBase destination. When you add an HBase configuration property, enter the exact property name and the value. The HBase destination does not validate the property names or values.Any individual properties that you configure override properties defined in the HBase configuration file.
